code: import{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./styles/App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const navigate=useNavigate();const[name,setName]=useState('');const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');function navLogin(){navigate('/login');}async function registeruser(event){event.preventDefault();const response=await fetch('http://localhost:1337/api/register',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({name,email,password})});const data=await response.json();if(data.status==='ok'){navigate('/login');}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"form-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"rectangle"}),"      ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Register"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:registeruser,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),type:"text",placeholder:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),type:"email",placeholder:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),type:"password",placeholder:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"submit",value:"Register"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:navLogin,children:"Login"})]})]});}export default App;
